newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax Systems to make acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax Systems to make acquisition.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said it reached an agreement in principle to acquire Four Corners Technology Inc, an enterprise network solutions company headquartered in Scottsdale, Ariz.
The transaction will be an all-stock merger and is expected to be accounted for as a pooling-of-interests.
The closing will occur before June 30, and is subject to completion of final merger documents, completion of a due diligence review, and approval of the Eltrax board.
Four Corners markets enterprise network systems and services.
Separately, Eltrax said it confirmed the completion of its merger with EJG Techline Inc of Agoura Hills, Calif., which was closed on May 14.
"Four Corners Technology fits perfectly into our strategy to build a national provider of network products and services," William O'Reilly, chairman, said in a statement.
Eltrax is a nationwide network services company, providing communications products and services.
